reviews.review:
Weird is how this movie made me feel. The best adjective I could find to fit this movie perfectly was 'Tolerable.' If you are a parent and watching this with your kids, prepare yourself. But it won't matter in a week because this movie is so forgettable. It wasn't 'funny' or entertaining, in fact the entire time I watched it, I felt uncomfortable. Please, just watch Charlotte's Web instead.

My 'Charlotte's Web' Rotten Tomato Rating: 91%

My 'The Emoji Movie' Rotten Tomato Rating: 21%
1.05/5 Stars
The only thing that is good about this movie is that the movie is well animated.
Pure art, Want to see again and again
It's an amazing drama that's about a character fighting against societal norms and falling in love while he does it.
The best movie I have ever seen! I recommended this to all of my friends and family!

Yea,Yea I know were millenials and all that but, Bruh, Really an actual movie about sentient emojjis! Not only was it literally the dullest thing ever and i wasted like an hour and a half of my life. But it had so many ad references.Commercials are more entertaining. DONT WASTE YOUR TIME WITH THIS MOVIE!!!!!
Hollywood is definitely running out of ideas.

Watched it when it came out, and I think it is still a so-so movie. The idea of making a movie about emoji could be fresh and attractive but it clearly did not brought all the potential power in that topic - though I can sense they are at least trying. As for the boring story line and rotten plots, well I have watched enough cartoon movie to give it a go. I mean, come on, just how many movies from even Disney make you feel totally fresh these years? What I think the largest problem is that they did not even try to hide the greedy intension of marketing apps. You want to make money, fine, but can you please try not to smash your commercials in our face in all the unnecessary points? Finally, I would like to say this: do you REALLY think emojis are these icon formats you used? Come on, try to look up to the ASC-II kind of emojis, especially the ones used daily by Japanese people. Now THAT is what emoji really means! If you don't understand that, you can never get the most interesting part of emoji world.
